ygData.subject: Catch me if you can!

* She slammed her shoulder against the door over and over again, the steel 
groaning and screeching as it bended and twisted from every strike.
She had to get out! That was all that mattered.

Finally, backing up until she was past Prowl, she charged the door and felt 
it snapp.
Both her and the door caved in on the other side, bracing herself as they 
both landed with a loud metallic sounding thud.
She was free!!

Then, without a second thought she charged into the hall and then looked 
down it, most of the shadows hiding her appearence.
Her breath was quick but she wasn't tired, still knowing that she had the 
rest of the ship to get through before she was completly free.

With a heave of her muscles and started at a dead run down the hall, taking 
bits from her memory to find the way out...which wasn't far at this pace.*
